mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO WHERE B.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: update board set count = count + 1 where board_no = #{boardNo} and status ='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, board_title, board_content, user_id, count, create_date FROM board b join member on (board_writer = user_no) WHERE b.status='Y' and board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT reply_content, user_id, create_date FROM reply r inner join member on (reply_writer = user_no) WHERE ref_bno = ${refBon} and r.status = 'Y'
